de.polygonal.gl.color.ColorConversion

type
class
Color Conversion Algorithms.
From http://www.cs.rit.edu/~ncs/color/t_convert.html

Static Variables

HSVtoRGB(inline,null) : hsv : HSV -> ?rgb : RGB -> RGB

Converts a hsv color value to an rgb color value.

RGBtoHSV(inline,null) : rgb : RGB -> ?hsv : HSV -> HSV

Converts an rgb color value to a hsv color value.
